intro.title: Tutorial Intro
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

module-1/python-agents-rclpy.title: Python Agents & rclpy: Connecting AI Logic to ROS 2
module-1/python-agents-rclpy.description: Understanding how to create Python-based agents that communicate with ROS 2 nodes using the rclpy client library

module-1/ros2-basics.title: ROS 2 Basics: The Robotic Nervous System
module-1/ros2-basics.description: Understanding the fundamentals of ROS 2, the middleware that connects all parts of a robotic system

module-1/urdf-humanoids.title: URDF for Humanoids: Describing Robot Structure
module-1/urdf-humanoids.description: Understanding Unified Robot Description Format (URDF) for describing humanoid robot structures and connecting AI logic to robot hardware

module-2/digital-twins-physical-ai.title: Digital Twins for Physical AI
module-2/digital-twins-physical-ai.description: Understanding digital twins and their role in Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-2/gazebo-physics-simulation.title: Physics Simulation with Gazebo
module-2/gazebo-physics-simulation.description: Using Gazebo for physics-based simulation in Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-2/index.title: Module 2: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)
module-2/index.description: Welcome to Module 2 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics series. This module focuses on digital twin simulation using Gazebo and Unity, building upon the ROS 2 fundamentals from Module 1.

module-2/unity-high-fidelity-interaction.title: High-Fidelity Simulation with Unity
module-2/unity-high-fidelity-interaction.description: Using Unity for high-fidelity visual simulation in Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-3/index.title: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)
module-3/index.description: Overview of NVIDIA Isaac platform for advanced perception, training, and navigation for humanoid robots

module-3/isaac-ros-vslam.title: Isaac ROS & VSLAM
module-3/isaac-ros-vslam.description: Hardware-accelerated perception and Visual SLAM for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-3/nav2-humanoid-navigation.title: Nav2 for Humanoid Navigation
module-3/nav2-humanoid-navigation.description: Path planning concepts and navigation for bipedal humanoid robots with perception integration

module-3/nvidia-isaac-sim.title: NVIDIA Isaac Sim
module-3/nvidia-isaac-sim.description: Photorealistic simulation and synthetic data generation for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-4/autonomous-humanoid.title: Capstone – The Autonomous Humanoid
module-4/autonomous-humanoid.description: End-to-end system overview with perception, navigation, manipulation pipeline for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-4/index.title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action (VLA)
module-4/index.description: Overview of Vision-Language-Action pipelines integrating LLMs with robotics for perception, planning, and action

module-4/llm-planning.title: Cognitive Planning with LLMs
module-4/llm-planning.description: Translating natural language into action sequences and mapping plans to ROS 2 actions for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

module-4/voice-to-action.title: Voice-to-Action
module-4/voice-to-action.description: Speech input using OpenAI Whisper and converting voice commands to robot intents for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
